parameters.name: GlobalIgName
parameters.description:
The name of the IP whitelist template. The name must meet the following requirements:

*   It can contain lowercase letters, digits, and underscores (\_).
*   It must start with a letter and end with a letter or digit.
*   It must be 2 to 120 characters in length.

parameters.name: GlobalSecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the IP whitelist template.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
